segments.text: The kitchen layout draws my eye to the right side first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman in her dress and apron dries that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's facing away from the sink, which is bizarre.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water flows from the faucet, filling and spilling over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle widens on the floor beneath her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now shifting left, the cabinet doors hang open.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the cookie jar brims with treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy balances on the unstable stool, reaching in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His other hand holds a plate awkwardly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands ready, palm out for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their cooperation is endearing amid the risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the wet floor adds slipperiness to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden path looks inviting and safe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This mix of calm and chaos is oddly captivating.
segments.speaker: PAR
